pkgmetadata.longdescription: Methods for Time Series Analysis // A collection of functions to perform Detrended Fluctuation Analysis (DFA exponent), GUEDES et al. (2019) doi:10.1016/j.physa.2019.04.132 , Detrended cross-correlation coefficient (RHODCCA), GUEDES ZEBENDE (2019) doi:10.1016/j.physa.2019.121286, DMCA cross-correlation coefficient and Detrended multiple cross-correlation coefficient (DMC), GUEDES SILVA-FILHO ZEBENDE (2018) doi:10.1016/j.physa.2021.125990, both with sliding windows approach.
